body_html:
Note that after the refactoring, one should create layer variables via the add_variable method (see other layers for examples). This takes care of keeping track of the weights and losses.

Basically the recently introduced Conv3DTranspose layer (added via a GitHub PR) should be edited to include this fix. It's just a 2-line change. How do we proceed?
body_text:
Note that after the refactoring, one should create layer variables via the add_variable method (see other layers for examples). This takes care of keeping track of the weights and losses.
Basically the recently introduced Conv3DTranspose layer (added via a GitHub PR) should be edited to include this fix. It's just a 2-line change. How do we proceed?
body:
Note that after the refactoring, one should create layer variables via the `add_variable` method (see other layers for examples). This takes care of keeping track of the weights and losses.

Basically the recently introduced `Conv3DTranspose` layer (added via a GitHub PR) should be edited to include this fix. It's just a 2-line change. How do we proceed?
